website_summaries.verdict: Although fragile, this unit provides fantastic aeration and filtering at a nice price.
pros: Aeration process quickly improves aroma and taste

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I wasn't aware of how important aerating wine was until I purchased this product. It made a HUGE difference in my wine consumption and experience! I now leave it on my counter ready for the next bottle of wine as I prepare dinner. The aerating is essential to allowing the wine to BREATH and helps to remove any sediments! Highly, Highly recommend this product for its quality and its price point too which is an added bonus!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great all in one solution for wine time :) - Few things to note cleaning this contraption is hard - Buy the wine stand there are a few that work great - so happy with this for the price - just rinse with water when finished using and set out to dry - Knocked it to 4 starts instead of 5 because its hard to clean the aerator...still worth the purchase! - I bought 3 of these for my family members!
customer_reviews.author: girl mom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good decanter for it's price. It looks nice and the aerator is a nice touch. It would be GREAT if it had come with a cork or something from the same material to put it on once you are not pouring any more wine. But, maybe the answer is: "do not ever leave wine in the decanter, drink it ALL". The taste of the wine changes a bit, for better. So it serves it's purpose. I do believe that is best to pour it through the aerator, and leave it there for a little while to get the most of it, before serving. I am happy with it, overall
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Only one improvement
customer_reviews.text: I really like this decanter. I love the aerator, too! My only wish is that the decanter had a thinner rim to prevent the wine from dribbling down the side of the decanter after pouring. There might be a pour technique that I could develop to prevent that, but for now, this is still an issue I'm dealing with. Otherwise, a perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Veksler

customer_reviews.title: Great and not so
customer_reviews.text: This decanter is very slow to fill due to the aerator which is less effective than the venturi type. It is also difficult to clean. the screen is a good idea and actual decanter is well made and elegant. I will use my venturi aerator with it and be quite satisfied
customer_reviews.author: xrider

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: Even with specialty products, this decanter is difficult to clean. The double wall aerator is exceptionally difficult.That being said, it's a beautiful piece with a very nice aerator that is worth it's trouble. My parents loved this as a gift and bring it out all the time when company is over as it's great entertainment to watch the wine being aerated for those of our family who have never seen it done.
customer_reviews.author: Cemmyberry

customer_reviews.title: Great Decanter
customer_reviews.text: Just used this decanter for the first time and I love it. It is exactly as advertised. Sturdy glass, I read some reviews that said the glass was thin, I don't know what they are talking about or maybe they manufacturer used a thicker mold for this one. This decanter can hold a magnum easily. the bulb and stem piece are thinner glass so be careful with those. All-in-all a great product for the cost of some others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Nice decanter.
customer_reviews.text: I was attracted to this decanter for the beautiful shape and the aerator. I like it as a decanter but the aerator is a bit hard to clean and takes forever to dry. I'd give it more stars if it somehow came apart for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Buy one for you and one for someone.
customer_reviews.text: We have had one for a while. This one we bought as a gift. All of our guest are always so impressed with the beautiful pour and of course decanting makes everything taste better. I LOVE this. Keep it rinsed and cleaned though, not easy to get in the double glass... Well maybe impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Michael PR

customer_reviews.title: Not just aerated,  much nicer
customer_reviews.text: Just watching the flow and diversion is interesting & and it is great for enhancing wine flavours. This is not too small or big & it's shape opens wine nicely. Not a gimmick, the real deal. May I suggest the metal bag dryer, it is sturdy & holds the carafe safely while it drys completely.
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Air it before you Share it
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product for the price. I'm quickly becoming a big fan of the various wines and find this product to be of good quality and use. It would be nice if there was a cradle for the aerator to sit in but that's a minor gripe.
customer_reviews.author: Donn E. Green

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. This one is nice enough for the dining room table and priced so that she doesn't kill me if I break it in the sink... She also got one of the handheld venturi ones which is nice, but when we have company, this one steals the show. Also purchased the stand (tippy, but good) and the brush - not sure it'd ever get dirty enough to warrant serious scrubbing, but nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: LAXPatrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy glass
customer_reviews.text: I ended up breaking the glass aerator. Oh well, don't need that headache anyway. This decanter aerates sufficiently just on its own and is a nice sturdy glass. Not cheap and thin. Worth the price even if you don't use the aerator.
customer_reviews.author: Angela F

customer_reviews.title: Great Decanter and cool accesories, aerator!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice decanter and then I saw this one that included the double aerator and filter. I ordered it, it arrived super on time, the product is pretty good, nice quality and people gets really interested in it when they see it working. I really liked this decanter and its accesories.
customer_reviews.author: Nuncio @ FL

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. Aerates very well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife for Christmas. She loved it. Aerates very well. Poured a big bottle of Chianti and took it all. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: I love
customer_reviews.text: The top part has small holes and doesn't empty all the wine making the last few drops hard to get out or water after cleaning. Otherwise, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Katharine L. Stadler

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this decanter, it's beautiful and filters 3 times. Recommend to all
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Ruch

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have one
customer_reviews.text: OK this thing is AWESOME. Really works well and puts on a good show as you are pouring the wine. Our friends were tripping out on it and they are going to buy one. It's cool.
customer_reviews.author: JHeg

customer_reviews.title: Great decanter, OK aerator
customer_reviews.text: The decanter is great. Unlike my previous decanter, this is thick walled enough to withstand shipping as well as light cleaning, but not so thick that it is obnoxious. The aerator on the other hand is only OK. It works fine for aerating the wine, but cleaning it is a hassle, and water always gets stuck inside the aeration tube. Thankfully, a vinturi aerator fits perfectly in the top of the decanter, so I just use that for aeration instead.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Great decanter, but the double wall aerator breaks very ...
customer_reviews.text: Great decanter, but the double wall aerator breaks very easily. It is hard to get that replaced without having to buy the set over. But overall, a good product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, works well, but hard to clean and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Good product with a flaw
customer_reviews.text: This product does a great job opening up the red wine I have used with it so far. The only downside is with the aireator. A few drops of water or wine get trapped at the bottom of the tube since there are no holes drilled at the bottom. Not sure if it is a design flaw or just a downside of the system.
customer_reviews.author: Moss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The aerator is great and the decanter makes the wine taste fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Julie M

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and gadget for wine enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gift and a tool. Purchased it more than 5 times - for myself and as a gift. Especially for those who appreciate good wines and those who pretty much have everything.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri Popov

customer_reviews.title: Read On
customer_reviews.text: I liked what this product did but it was so lightweight that it broke during the first week while pouring wine into the top. Without touching the aerator the top portion tipped over breaking the entire unit.
customer_reviews.author: Please so far

customer_reviews.title: Skip the aerator
customer_reviews.text: The decanter is great! The aerator is a monster to clean.
customer_reviews.author: CorrieG

customer_reviews.title: No wining, this is great!
customer_reviews.text: A really great product! It's like watching a science experiment, and you really can taste a difference in the wine. The flavors of the wine are enhanced greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. I just need to remember to decant and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I just need to remember to decant and let my wine rest longer, I always want to drink too soon. Wine is yummy.
customer_reviews.author: aryndar

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto
customer_reviews.text: This decanter is a steal. It's beautiful and effective. Cleans well and filters well.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Great decanter, and the aerator works well
customer_reviews.text: Great decanter, and the aerator works well. I have to complain, like others, about the bottom of the aerator tube not having a hole. I hate leaving that last drop of wine, or even water after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Vann Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice decanter.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice decanter...not sure how well it aerates. I use it for home made wine and appreciate the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Burner

customer_reviews.title: Great Decanter
customer_reviews.text: I have used this decanter to filter some aged Cabernets that should be well beyond their "sell by" dates (vintage 1995). The aggressive aeration and quality filtering restores these wines to superb condition. They still retain a somewhat tawny character as befits their age but some of these wines from good vintage years were better than more recent wines from less successful vintage years that were 3-5 years old. I would recommend a second filtration for older wines as there is still some sediment after a single filtration, although a careful pour will leave most of it in the decanter.
customer_reviews.author: David Ferris

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought a very similar device from William Sonoma at approximately twice the price. This wine aerator is works well and is fun to use, my wife and I enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: proud papa

customer_reviews.title: Love this decanter
customer_reviews.text: Love this decanter! Completely transforms the taste of wine, the only downfall is that the inside is hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: We sent this to my brother as a gift. ...
customer_reviews.text: We sent this to my brother as a gift. We actually haven't seen it yet. But it arrived quickly and was all in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M.

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my work. It has held up great though multiple customer usage. I will deffinatly but this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostly

customer_reviews.title: Yea let it breath
customer_reviews.text: Its a great device that reduces the time to enjoy a wonderful bottle or two of bordeaux. This is a good claret's best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Mmm mmm smooth
customer_reviews.text: This really makes a difference in the smoothness of my red wines. Makes even the heartiest wine more palatable.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decanter does an excellent job of aerating a bottle of wine.
customer_reviews.author: N. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this decanter. It is beautiful and useful. It does it's job well and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Niblack

customer_reviews.title: Great thing. The only problem is that it's impossible ...
customer_reviews.text: Great thing. The only problem is that it's impossible to wash it perfectly, so after a few years it now has pretty bad staining inside.
customer_reviews.author: pleased user

customer_reviews.title: Simple & elegant
customer_reviews.text: I love this decanter! It's simple, looks elegant, and makes even a lower quality wine taste good with the filter and aeration.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decanter
customer_reviews.text: This decanter is excellent, very nice looking, and seems to work beautifully with the wine I have used with it.
customer_reviews.author: don_wallace

customer_reviews.title: WINE ENTHUSIASTS COME HITHER !!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect wine Aerator! I have recommended this product to several friends!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This item looks great while in use and just sitting out on display. We have used it several times and seems to working good.
customer_reviews.author: MicheleTH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pouring a glass of wine is like a party trick now. Super cool effect.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: tough to keep clean/remove streak marks
customer_reviews.text: It dries streaky. And this after I bought a special decanter drying holder and a special decanter brush to present this exact thing. Sort of embarrassing when I use it in front of friends especially after I'm sure I cleaned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love this decanter. It looks great and works well. A little hard to clean everything but I think every decanter out there is hard to clean. Great product would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Decanter. However the glass aerator is difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Decanter. However the glass aerator is difficult to clean. It is very fragile, so be careful while handling and cleaning it. It is sold only as part of the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I can't figure out how to best remove it
customer_reviews.text: The decanter is exactly as I expected. The only issue I have is with the double walled aerator; after washing it, water remains in the tube, and I can't figure out how to best remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Amalia S

customer_reviews.title: I love my Decatur
customer_reviews.text: I love my Decatur . It not only of course helps the wine to breathe but it looks beautiful as it filters downward. It's a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: very cool, very thick glass
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this would feel super cheap and not set up well. However, this thing is perfect, and all the pieces fit well. I kept the box for the funnel part so it won't break. Overall, perfect birthday gift for my girlfriend.
customer_reviews.author: unitmonster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daugher loved this gift. It was such a hit I have ordered another one for my brother.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not a good value at the price.
customer_reviews.text: The aerator is so poorly designed, what were they thinking? It is impossible to clean. The decanter is poorly finished. Damn it's tough to be old and remember when everything was not shoddy Chinese-made garbage. Maybe Amazon could start putting the country of origin.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough quality for the price, and both the decanter and aerator work great! We are quite pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CL10

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very fragile. The aerator broke while I was removing it from the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Lipp

customer_reviews.title: l a good
customer_reviews.text: aerator difficult to clean and dry. but, all in al,l a good value
customer_reviews.author: G J

customer_reviews.title: Wine  Decanter
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase, not only does it make your wine taste better BUT it is just fun to use and people love to see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: kz

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This decanter worked great for a few months then one day while pouring wine out of it a chunk of the glass at the bottom just popped out. Took great care of it, so it was a structural integrity problem. I notified the company and they refused to replace it. If it was half the price I wouldn't care that it was terrible quality glass, but at $40 I expect it to not fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Salamone

customer_reviews.title: Wine Decanter
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what we expected, and it is nice. I would recommend it to anyone for a nice fathers day gift
customer_reviews.author: Robin G. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this decanter! It is a combo aerator and decanter. It works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have this product around one month, My son bought it for me as a birthday gift. Today I touched it by tip, and it left in my hand, separated from the body of the funnel. Actually the tip was attached to the body just in one point. Poor quality. Now would like to but the new part but most likely will not the same.
customer_reviews.author: drdreidel

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift Idea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my parents and they absolutely loved it! I found the quality to be excellent and the price made this a great deal - I'm ordering 2 more as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: SparkleConnoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This decanter is very durable and easy to clean. We kept wine in it for 4 days while we were out of town and it was still good when we got back. The aerator is very effective and really adds a richness to the wine.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The aerator does allows for wine to stay I.
customer_reviews.text: The aerator does allows for wine to stay I. The bottom of it and it is nearly impossible to clean properly
customer_reviews.author: greg rutkowski

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods!
customer_reviews.text: There is a chip in the glass! Despite the large amount of packaging there is a small nick in the glass of the decanter I plan on returning it
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Appel

customer_reviews.title: Wash the aerator as soon as you finish with it
customer_reviews.text: So bummed!! Be sure to wash the aerator as soon as you finish with it. We left it sit overnight and a build up of white goo built up and there is no way to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: heidicm

customer_reviews.title: It's a great novelty that gets people talking as you pour the ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are a wine drinker this is a MUST. It's a great novelty that gets people talking as you pour the wine into the decanter. You can taste the difference if you do a before and after taste test. It totally eliminates the hangover...We drank over 10 bottles for new years (12 people) and nobody had a hangover. Obviously be safe and don't drink and drive.
customer_reviews.author: Euclides

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This a fine aerator and an attractive though less than functional decanter. In terms of bringing out the best in your wine I have no criticism. It does work well for that. In term of something from which you can easily pour wine, that takes some practice. It's a bit clumsy. But it can be mastered. Cleaning the decanter is easy. Cleaning the aerator is a little more difficult as once suds gets inside, it takes a while to get it out again. It looks good and works well with just a couple of minor drawbacks. Overall, for the price, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dad.
customer_reviews.text: This decanter is famous in my family. I bought it as a father's day gift for my "wine connoisseur" dad; me, at twenty six, knowing just enough about wine to get me into trouble. He loves it. The aerator is well made and fits beautifully in this decanter as well as others, and the strainer is a nice touch too. You can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible design. I purchased as a gift because I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible design. I purchased as a gift because I liked that this came as a set and the aerator didn't need a separate stand (we have the Vinturi aerator and stand, which is a great design but can be annoying as you need a separate place to set it and with limited counter space, this stays in the box). Aerator doesn't filter wine through the bottom, but through tiny holes on the sides of the stem. This leaves a lot of wine in the aerator itself, as others have commented (I wish I had fully read these reviews before purchasing!). Terrible quality. Not worth the $27 I paid on Black Friday.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T Mazur

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: The decanter looks very nice and seems much sturdier than I expected (based on some of the negative reviews here). The areator works fine but it is hard to dry - there is water in the inner tube below the holes that is impossible to get out. The decanter itself is easy to clean - I just rinse it with hot soapy water, dry it with a paper towel and and put it upside doen on the simple stand I bought with it. I keep the areator separately in a tall glass.
customer_reviews.author: apjaworski

customer_reviews.title: Solid, simple decanter
customer_reviews.text: This decanter is plain and simple, and works as advertised. The aerator works well, evenly dispersing the wine in 4 directions down the sides of the decanter, but its design is somewhat flawed with regard to cleaning it. It tends to trap water inside, with no way to effectively drain it. Also the shape of the decanter makes it somewhat hard to clean, likely the reason they try to sell you a cleaning brush with it. I recommend this, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Blair

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and awesome to see being used.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my nephew, and once I saw it in action, I wish I bought one for myself too. The decanter itself is very well made and not delicate at all. The aerator on the other hand seems a bit fragile. Like others have mentioned, cleaning the aerator will be a problem. I suggested to my nephew to maybe soak it in vinegar when it needs a good cleaning. Otherwise, not sure how you can clean it thoroughly. The box it came in keeps it safe and secure during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Victor S.

customer_reviews.title: delicate neck getting broken NOT a concern
customer_reviews.text: it is really neat to watch (at least for me) and always is commented on. I use this in conjunction with the the wine enthusiast decanter drying stand, and sometime the WMF Vino stainless-steel 4 way funnel. my review of that should be available shortly, item came well packed and my concerns about the delicate neck getting broken was not needed
customer_reviews.author: mh

customer_reviews.title: Major design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: The design has a major flaw. The aerator is IMPOSSIBLE to clean quickly. The design holds water in the bottom of the tube and there is no way to get it dry. Returning for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Blue Gal

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the look of this decanter
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the look of this decanter, works great and sort of puts some dazzle in serving the wine. As others have said, it is a little difficult to clean and get all the water out but it's not all that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Yes water stays in bottom but I just turn over and give a good shake. Those pickier might try a hair drier
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give it 1000 stars. So,so classy the way wine flows thu aerator! So fragile wish I could buy that part separately. Yes water stays in bottom but I just turn over and give a good shake. Those pickier might try a hair drier. Good grief!. Awesome and am buying another if I break this one. So,so impressive and pretty for entertaining presentation. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Bugsy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Changes the taste after decanting for just 15 minutes Don't listen to the reviews about hard to clean. What you need to do is get in the habit of rinceing with water just after you finish using the airator and wine will not build up. If you let it sit it drys inside. Just something we do everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Magidson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This decanter is well made and works great. Red wine tastes a great deal better when decantered with an aerator. This particular decanter makes a beautiful presentation at the dining table when the wine is poured through it. It's so much fun to watch how the wine spills through the double wall aerator and then pours down the inside of the decanter walls. Red wine needs to breath about 40 minutes before serving and with this decanter it literally speeds the process up within seconds. Buy it you will not be disappointed. I also purchased the "Decanter Drying Stand Plus" through Amazon because it helps to dry the inside of the decanter upside down safely.
customer_reviews.author: artist07

customer_reviews.title: Dont Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: If it wasnt for the double wall aerator I would probably have sent this back . I read the reviews before buying and thought it would be a quality decanter but its not . Cheap light glass with all defects in the glass thats obvious to the eye .... Dont waste your money ... If you already have an aerator and only need a decanter go to your local Marshalls home goods and get one for $10 like I did before I wasted $50 on this one . Thought I was upgrading to a quality one and got a cheaper one instead. Typical overpriced Chinese crap passed off as a "quality" product .
customer_reviews.author: mike sesty

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poor fabrication.
customer_reviews.text: The aerator holes does not work as well as the picture. They were stamped into the hot glass and they should have been drilled. The stamped holes create an inconsistent flow. (some flow well, some very little. So the full aerator effect doesn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Undrae R. Winding

customer_reviews.title: Rough finish
customer_reviews.text: The price is good for this item, the funnel is a nice touch, the format is good but I am a bit disappointed about the rough finish on the edge of the decanter. At first I thought it was chipped but saw it was just the way it is made. I guess this is one of the tradeoffs for the cheap price
customer_reviews.author: Cedric

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful in design but the aerator is very hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful in design but the aerator is very hard to clean and takes a long time to dry.
customer_reviews.author: WE

customer_reviews.title: Great decanter (we still use) however we lost the screen ...
customer_reviews.text: I am writing the review over a year after purchase. Great decanter (we still use) however we lost the screen several months ago and the aerator glass topper thing is impossible to clean. The decanter itself is also very hard to keep clean. I've tried it all, including; vinegar, hots soapy water, rice granules... it's still a great decanter. Just hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: H Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: hard to clean. Main item came with chip on the top of the glass, but not dangerous. It is your normal decanter. But the filter is tough to clean
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Vessel Great..... Aerator Very Hard to Keep Clean
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but aerator is very hard to clean and evacuate the remaining wine in the stem... also, scale builds up in the inside top of the aerator and requires soaking in a descaler solution to properly clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rich P

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and well made
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that I'm a wine expert, but I really like this (my one and only) decanter. It's sturdy, stylish, and a lot of fun to watch as it does its job dispersing the wine from two different sets of orifices- one up high in the "wine glass" looking top, and the other below inside the decanter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: In reading some reviews on my favorite wines I noticed how many recomended Decanting. The final touch decanter provided evrything I was looking for in a decanter. The airiation funnel makes an immidiate, noticeable, and positive difference in the wine.
customer_reviews.author: ricklarkin

customer_reviews.title: This is big!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but I like the style. It holds a LOT of whine so if your looking to fill with a 1 liter or smaller bottle of whine consider getting a different decanter. I am making wine by 1.5 liter bottles so this will work fine for my application. I look forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: frustrated

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for christmas as he is an avid red wine drinker. It really enhances the flavor, the packaging was well packaged. It is easy to use and clean as long as you have an actual decanter brush. I would reccomend the stand as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Davis

customer_reviews.title: we are not happy with this
customer_reviews.text: this product is not well made. there is no way to dry the airrate piece after you wash it. we are not happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Nom

customer_reviews.title: nice decanter
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice decanter, high quality with good price. You feel wonderful when you pouring the wine into it. But the double well aerator is a little bit hard to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Simple and efficient
customer_reviews.text: The aerator is well done and simple. The carafe is a “classic-but-good” style. Good product for wines connoisseurs. Is the stainless steel filter really necessary ?
customer_reviews.author: vonvonmoto

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes it
customer_reviews.text: She says she can taste the difference and it does taste better. Her only complaint, cleaning it. Make sure you buy the bendy brush or the stainless beads to go with this.w
customer_reviews.author: MertziePlays

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful product for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my supervisor and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome decanter
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a bridal shower present. I'll admit I was skeptical. I had some friends over to do a before and after decanter taste test. But it actually works and takes theffect bite out of the wine!
customer_reviews.author: L. Remi

customer_reviews.title: Great decanter and aerator
customer_reviews.text: The Final Touch Traditional Style Decanter with Double Wall Aerator works great at decanting and aerating wine. It's also puts on a bit of a show for guests, as the wine trickles down the side of the decanter. My only complaint is that it doesn't come with a cleaning stand and is a bit of a pain to clean but I would highly recommend this product to any wine enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Not having any issues with clogging as described by other buyers. Really impressive with guests during decanting.
customer_reviews.author: beejlang-Houston

customer_reviews.title: Wine will never be the same
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed the way I taste wine altogether. It's simple to use and turns a cheap bottle of wine into something you've never tasted before. You have to get used to cleaning it but once you do its a dream. I recommend purchasing a cleaning brush for it.
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: Final Touch Flavour Enhancer Aerator & Decanter Set
product_meta.description: Size:Flavour Enhancer Aerator SetTakes wine from good, to better, to best! Pour through the filtering screen into the inner bowl of the aerator.
feature_bullets: Wine streams through 8 breathing holes and aerates a first time
Screen is stainless steel. Machine made decanter and double-wall glass aerator are lead-free
Glass decanter with aerator and stainless steel sediment filter
